name: poison-touch

effect.x_y: This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning the target with each hit. This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of shield dust. This ability takes effect before mummy.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning the target with each hit. This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of shield dust. This ability takes effect before mummy.

short_effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning target Pokémon upon contact.

flavor_text.x_y: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
